ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi...I am looking for a EQ entusiast (addict) for  a TV Interview
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems to me that several people on the board need to quit jumping to conclusions and give people a chance.  I have seen many more flames & rudness in recent
ygData.messageBody:
It seems to me that several people on the board need to quit jumping to conclusions and give people a chance.  I have seen many more flames & rudness in recent weeks from many of you,  and it is distressing that we seem to be nit picking at others because of their opionions. I thought the point of this group was to share our love of EQ with eachother, rather than flaming & accusing because of personal opionions.  We are all entitled to our own opionions, and I am just expressing mine.

Toni  AKA
Katashaka Naboombu
52 Vah Shir Mystic

 David Langille <tuxedomystery2000@...> wrote:

I confess, I was wrong to flat out go out and accuse you of such things. WHo knows, maybe you'll be able to proove the stereotype wrong, and stop the madness :)

BTW, as for TechTV in general, man I wish that I had that channel. ANy chance of it going into basic cable? 

 



Toni aka     Katashaka Naboombu 

 Championsofwar
